C

Clears all notes from the model and notifies observers of the change.
clearNoteText() - Method in class view.NotesView
Clears the text from the note text area, resetting it to an empty state.
controller - package controller
 
createFileMenu() - Method in class view.FileMenuHandler
Constructs and configures the "File" menu for the application with menu items for actions such as printing, creating new documents, opening, saving, and exiting the application.

Creates and returns the panel containing print options such as printer selection, number of copies, page range, page size, print quality, and orientation.

Creates a 'plus' button with an icon, intended for toggling the visibility of the overlay panel.
createPreviewPanel() - Method in class view.PrintPreviewExample
Creates and returns the panel that displays the print preview.
createRightToolBar() - Method in class view.CustomizableMenu
Creates and configures a JToolBar aligned to the right side of the frame.
createToolBar() - Method in class view.ToolBarHandler
Creates and returns a JToolBar equipped with buttons for undo and redo operations, a font size slider, an autosave toggle, and a notebook selection button.
CustomizableMenu - Class in view
The CustomizableMenu class implements a customizable menu within a JFrame.
CustomizableMenu(JFrame) - Constructor for class view.CustomizableMenu
Constructs a CustomizableMenu attached to the specified JFrame and initializes the right and bottom toolbars with default properties.

displayPrintPreview() - Method in class view.PrintPreviewExample

exitOverlay() - Method in class view.CustomizableMenu
Closes the overlay by setting the overlay panel and bottom toolbar to invisible and updates the right toolbar with an additional button.

N

Represents the central data management class in a note-taking application following the MVC pattern.

Private constructor to prevent external instantiation.
NotesView - Class in view
The NotesView class implements the Observer interface and serves as the graphical user interface for a notes application.

Constructs the NotesView.
